issue.title: Only send JIRA updates to issues@arrow.apache.org
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-690](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-690). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Users who wish to receive JIRA e-mail updates can subscribe to issues@arrow.apache.org. It may be better to keep the traffic to dev@ lighter to facilitate community development and discussions.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-690?focusedCommentId=15936642) by Julian Hyde (julianhyde):*
Presumably the creation email would continue to be sent to dev@arrow.apache.org. If so, I support this proposal.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-690?focusedCommentId=15938244) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I created INFRA-13735 for this

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-690?focusedCommentId=15938316) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Done. I'm sending an e-mail to the mailing list about subscribing to issues@
